nodes.text: The "Spirva Run" was the nickname give to the act of smuggling items from Galladinium's Datalog to rioters in the Spirva sector. Cynabar's InfoNet reported that noted smugglers such as Tru'eb Cholakk, Bettle and Jaxa, and To'iir and Liadden were cashing in on the Spirva riots, though the latter pair had been caught after running several loads of gladiator walkers into the sector.
